text: As the Mootland struggles to defend its borders and homes, a growing contingent of Halflings and representatives of other states plead it fall under Imperial protection, for fear it will soon fall into enemy hands. Though they are still many Halflings that resist this and blame underhanded politicking, even some Elector Counts disagree, who think the Mootland should cede to them if anyone.
[[col:yellow]]Small chance Confederation will be offered again each turn[[/col]]
